Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yin_DiscipleCompleteCommandRandom
Text.Desc: Disciples ignore work arrangements and randomly complete instructions.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yin_SoulPetCanNotControl
Text.Desc: Spirit pets act as they please and no longer obey training

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yin_CantConfineTongling
Text.Desc: Cannot Confine Freezed Beings

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yin_CantInviteNpc
Text.Desc: Cannot invite others to your sect.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yin_Modifier_1
Text.Desc: Slightly reduce the spiritual energy recovery speed of sect disciples.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yin_Modifier_2
Text.Desc: Slows Sect disciples' Qi recovery.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yin_Modifier_3
Text.Desc: Significantly reduce the spiritual energy recovery speed of sect disciples.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yin_Modifier_4
Text.Desc: Reduce sect disciples' cultivation speed.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yin_Modifier_5
Text.Desc: Drastically slows Sect disciples' cultivation.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yin_Modifier_6
Text.Desc: Sect disciples become more prone to hunger.

Text.Desc: Sect disciples become more prone to fatigue.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yin_Modifier_8
Text.Desc: Sect disciples become more prone to Thirst.

Text.Desc: Slightly reduce the strength of the Qi barrier for sect disciples.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yin_Modifier_10
Text.Desc: Reduce the strength of the Qi barrier for sect disciples.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yin_Modifier_11
Text.Desc: Slightly decreases the probability of sect disciples breaking through bottlenecks.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yin_Modifier_12
Text.Desc: Reduce the probability of sect disciples breaking through bottlenecks

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Yin_Modifier_18
